text: Raju Singh Mahi (born 16 September 1983) is an Indian film actor. He known for his acting in Bhojpuri cinema's blockbuster movies Sabse Bada Champion, Gadar 2 and Love Ke Liye Kuchh Bhi Karega ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" | style="background:#ffc;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} * Sabse Bada Champion * Gadar 2 * Love Ke Liye Kuchh Bhi Karega * Tu Hi To Meri Jaan Hai Radha 2 * Maai Re Hamra Uhe Ladki Chahi * Pakistan me Jai Shree Ram * Teen Budbak * Gadar * Vidhayak Jee * Policegiri {| class="wikitable" | style="background:#ffc;"| | Bade Miya Chhote Miya |} {| class="wikitable" | style="background:#ffc;"| | Gumrah |} ===Music videos=== * Zindagi Jhand Ba Phir Bhi Ghamand Ba ==Awards== Raju Singh Mahi received the Best Supporting Actor Award at the Dadasaheb Phalke Icon Award 2019 for Tu Hi To Meri Jaan Hai Radha 2 ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Indian male film actors Category:21st-century Indian male actors
title: Raju Singh Mahi
